name.fr: Bouton Ajouter à ma Liste de Cadeaux | Wishtack

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill your Wishtack wishlist from any website and let your friends offer you gifts or contribute to the money pot we create for you.
short.fr: Remplissez votre liste de cadeaux Wishtack depuis n'importe quel site et laissez vos amis contribuer à votre pot commun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wishtack's Add to Wishlist button extension will automatically add an "Add to Wishlist" button at the bottom right of any product page of any of your favorite shopping websites.

You can then share your wishes on any social network or by email.

Once shared, your friends are able to promise the gift and get in touch with you other friends to make a grouped gift.

In addition to this, we automatically create a money pot for you where any of your friends can contribute.

You can see Wishtack as the Amazon wishlist but it's easier to use and you have a money pot with no time limit where you can withdraw the money whenever you want.
long.fr:
With Wishtack, you can make your wishlist, baby registry, wedding registry or christmas wishlist in just one click from any shop on Internet then share it with your beloved.

You are probably tired of having your wishlists spread out between multiple websites. Now with Wishtack you can regroup all your wishlists into one.

Simply go to any of your favorite websites, click on the extension's icon and then click on "Add to Wishlist".
You can also add a product to your wishlist by simply clicking on the right mouse button then "Add to Wishlist".

If you allow us to, we can share your wishes with your friends so they can get in touch with each other to offer you a grouped gift you'll love.

In addition to this, you can find great unique gift ideas for men, women, your mother, father, girlfriend, boyfriend, family and friends based on their tastes and interests.
